FuncDef: This command creates an Access Node Control Protocol (ANCP) policy. The policy is associated with either the ANCP string (static case) or subscriber-profile (dynamic case) and defines the behavior of the hosts belonging to these profiles.

ParaDef.Info: Configures the ANCP policy name, up to 32 characters.
Keyword used to create the ANCP policy. The create keyword requirement can be enabled or disabled in the environment>create context.
